nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Shadows indicate riddles, illuminating unseen stars\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Penned by the enigmatic\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"merchant, Sirius, this tome\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"unveils his 'humble' origins,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"draped in shadow and affluence.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"A tale of ambition where modesty\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"meets grandeur.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"* \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true},{\"text\":\"Co-op Soulbound \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"*\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
